title: Change date format in Last Played view to dd-MMM-yyyy
Deleting a play item in the Plays view fails with a 403 error.
notes: Added detailed error logging. The 403 error is likely coming from the backend Eurogames API. The worker proxy is correctly forwarding the DELETE request to /v1/plays/:id. Check backend API permissions and whether DELETE operations are allowed.

title: Submitting the web form shows a 400 error and fails
